|brand = Synology |model = RackStation |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = RS816 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 08-04FRM4112 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;Armada 385; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 (v7) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.6 / 1.8 / 2.0 GHz (1.33 GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;N25Q64; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63CFR-TEC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1514; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1514; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.01;Marvell v.2015 T1.0p16; |stockos = Linux;3.10.102;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 (Type A), SATA 2, eSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 2.5-1.25 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, fan, heatsink, metal case, eSATA, SNMP, buzzer |addchip = RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, 2A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9199;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F1829;;1;,,, 4-port SATA 6Gb/s Host Controller;Marvell;88SE9215;;1;,,, MAX V 64 Macrocell Flash CPLD;Altera;5M80ZE64C5N;;1;,,, 18V 6A Synchronous Step-down Converter;MPS;MPQ8632GLE-6;;1;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDMS7694;;1;,,, 30V 9A P-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;1;,,, 30V 10A N-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4410GM;;1;,,, 1.5-18V 12A Single Synchronous Step-Down SWIFT Converter;TI;TPS53515;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = blank |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 846504002252 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01K1JSKC4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC}} ==Overview== It's a 4-bay 1U Rackmount NAS. This device has 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 and 1x eSATA ports. "P/N:08-04FRM4112", "Model:FRM41L2" and "Ver:V1.2" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|Synology RackStation RS812|List of NAS Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 @1.8GHz Dual Core (''Armada 385'' ARM V7) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 8MB SPI NOR Flash, 4x SATA, 1x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 100-240V, 2.5-1.24A via C13
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/synology-rackstation-rs816-nas-review ''Synology RackStation RS816 NAS Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] (Sep. 2016)
